tournament.name: Dallas Derby Devils Takeover Killer Queen
tournament.description:
Our Free Play Arlington tradition is restored! The Dallas Derby Devils are taking over Killer Queen and we are running a mixed event. That means you'll get to play side by side, teammates with your favorite derby skaters (and yes some of them will be on skates.) The winners hoist the Honey Pot trophy.
The DDD will be there taking over the Twitch stream, with merch from your favorite team colors, and more. It's a unique experience you won't find anywhere else.
tournament.registration_message:
Our Free Play Arlington tradition is restored! The Dallas Derby Devils are taking over Killer Queen and we are running a mixed event. That means you'll get to play side by side, teammates with your favorite derby skaters (and yes some of them will be on skates.) The winners hoist the Honey Pot trophy, win tickets to the next DDD Home Game and afterwards we all jam out to DJ Terminator Mike B.
The DDD will be there taking over the Twitch stream, with merch from your favorite team colors, and more. It's a unique experience you won't find anywhere else.
